body:
Minified:

``` Rust
enum Sexpression {
  Num(()),
  Cons(&'static mut Sexpression)
}

fn causes_ice(mut l: &mut Sexpression)
{
    loop { match l {
        &mut Sexpression::Num(ref mut n) => {},
        &mut Sexpression::Cons(ref mut expr) => {
            l = &mut **expr;
        }
    }}
}

fn main() {
}
```

Backtrace (this is a relatively old rustc 7bd71637c 2015-05-06, but playpen also crashes):

Added a test case in PR #34136
